scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sass styles/main.scss dist/style.css --source-map & cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --mode development --config webpack.config.cjs --watch
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sass styles/main.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.cjs
